title: DeSantis comms re: drag queen christmas

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: DeSantis comms re: drag queen christmas
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

All electronic communications, including text messages, sent or received by the following officials between Dec. 1, 2022 and Dec. 29, 2022 containing the key term "drag queen":

- Gov. Ron DeSantis
- Chief of Staff James Uthmeier
- Director of External Affairs Savannah Kelly Jefferson
- Director of Communications Taryn Fenske
- Press Secretary Bryan Griffin
- General Counsel Ryan Newman

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

CJ Ciaramella

title: Florida DBPR comms re: drag queen Christmas

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Florida DBPR comms re: drag queen Christmas
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

All electronic communications, including text messages, sent or received by Secretary Melanie Griffin between Dec. 1, 2022 and Dec. 29, 2022 containing the key terms "drag queen."

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

CJ Ciaramella
